news.title: Stock futures will resume trading at 8:30 a.m. ET after major disruption due to data center problem
news.summary: A technical problem obstructed futures trading at the Chicago Mercantile Exchange in the early hours of Friday morning. The problem involved a computer glitch.

news.title: Trump says U.S. to 'permanently pause migration from all Third World Countries’ after DC shooting
news.summary: The president said he would also terminate "millions" of admissions under his predecessor Joe Biden. He would remove "anyone who is not a net asset" to the U.S.

news.title: 'To sustain the ride, they started to dilute it': How Black Friday became a retail letdown
news.summary: For six straight years, online sales have outpaced stores. Black Friday used to be the biggest in-person shopping event of the year.

news.title: SEC investigates Jefferies over First Brands collapse, report says
news.summary: The SEC is looking into whether Jefferies gave investors enough information on their exposure to the failed auto business. The FT said the SEC is investigating Jefferies' exposure to failed auto company.

news.title: 'Green light' away from AI trade: Two ETF executives see a key market shift underway
news.summary: Markets may have entered a new cycle. Here's why. The U.S. stock market is up more than 1.5% this year.

news.title: These tech stocks join Alphabet among the sector’s rare gainers for November
news.summary: Certain AI plays bucked the tech sector’s selloff as the market got more discerning. The market is now looking at AI as a potential source of future growth.

news.title: CME says trading will restart soon after glitch causes Black Friday outage for U.S. equity futures
news.summary: CME Group says trading in U.S. equity futures should be restarting soon. Exchange operator says glitch knocked it out for several hours.

news.title: Why oil is on track to post its largest yearly decline since the pandemic
news.summary: Oil prices remain on track for their largest yearly loss since the pandemic. They may be near a short-term bottom, however, with lower prices likely to boost demand and temper global production.

news.title: Black Friday isn’t just for sales — it often kicks off a stretch of stock-market gains
news.summary: Investors can expect several seasonally bullish trading patterns from now into the new year. Investors can expect a number of bullish patterns in the coming months.

news.title: These stocks may benefit from a shift towards Google’s highly specialized AI microchips
news.summary: There are plenty of stocks that may flourish as a consequence of Google’s TPU ecosystem. If there is widespread adoption of TPU, there will be plenty of opportunities for investors.
